name: Mech Massacre
description:
This game was developed as part of the Brackey's game jam 2020.2.

You are a mad scientist in a laboratory. Create robots to kill other scientists to rule the world!

Controls:

WASD: Move

Mouse: Look

E: Interact

How to play:

There will be an in-game tutorial provided on how to play the game. 

To play, you must enter one of the 7 test chambers located in the test chamber hallway. Using the control panel inside the test chamber, you will then create robots and adding effects to them using the control panel. When you are done, you can press Done to complete and spawn the robot in the test chamber. You can press E on the blue button beside the control panel to open the doors and release the robot. The robot will automatically go after other scientists. The more stronger robots you create, the higher the score.

Known bugs:

-AI can not enter storage room
